      • getOutOfCodeBlockModificationCount

        public long getOutOfCodeBlockModificationCount()
        Specified by:
        getOutOfCodeBlockModificationCount in interface PsiModificationTracker
        Returns:
        Same as PsiModificationTracker.getJavaStructureModificationCount(), but also includes changes in non-Java files, e.g. XML. Rarely needed.

      • getJavaStructureModificationCount

        public long getJavaStructureModificationCount()
        Description copied from interface: PsiModificationTracker
        Tracks structural Java modifications, i.e. the ones on class/method/field/file level. Modifications inside method bodies are not tracked. Useful to work with resolve caches that only depend on Java structure, and not the method code.
        Specified by:
        getJavaStructureModificationCount in interface PsiModificationTracker
        Returns:
        current counter value. Increased whenever any physical PSI in Java structure is changed.
